title: What is naturopathy and naturopathic medicine?
description: Answer: Naturopathy or naturopathic medicine is a form of alternative medicine that employs an array of pseudoscientific practices branded as "natural", "non-invasive", and as promoting "self-healing. The principles of Naturopathy were first used by the Hippocratic School of Medicine in about 40...
